slogan: Add Subtitles Automatically To A Video With The Powerful Online Videoeditor.
trailer: You simply upload your video and the AI will caption and synchronize the whole video. Styling and editing subtitles are easier than ever and can be done with a few clicks. You can even add a progress bar, headline, or logo. Your first video is on us.
